reviewText:
This series is a wonderful tool for marriage enrichment.  I still had the complete except No 4 on word pictures, which must have been loaned out several ears back.  I'm very pleased to have the complete series again and will be using it again for training Sponsor Couples for the Engaged.

Deacon Pat Kenedy
Be loveable and not full of hate. Don't be a snob or look down at other people even if this includes certain family members or those who are less fortunate than us. What would Jesus do?

I bought this because somehow, in my moving I lost this volume. I loved it when I watched it many years go, and was excited to share it my daughter and her husband. They are watching the series and are learning so much about understanding the dynamics of their relationship, and their differences. Gary Smalley's insight into men and women is truly amazing. He uses love, common sense, and humor, to help you understand and strengthen your relationship and marriage. I have lost track of how many times I have lent this to friends over the years.
